Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First recall the standard Procure to Pay P2P process Reviewing P2P Process The Procure to Pay P2P process starts with creating a purchase requisition This is followed by approving the purchase requisition to move forward

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Examining Purchase Execution After approval a purchase order is issued to the vendor Goods are received and verified against the order

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Handling Vendor Payments The vendor invoice is received and checked for accuracy Finally the invoice is matched with the purchase order and receipt for payment processing

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Examining Purchase Execution The process includes matching the vendor invoice to the purchase order for verification Payment is released after matching followed by closing the case to complete the transaction

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Identifying Process Variations Standard P2P order involves creating approving and issuing before receiving goods and processing payments Variations can occur but logical sequencing is essential for control and efficiency
